files.Makefile:
CC=gcc
CFLAGS=-I.
DEPS = utils.h
OBJ = main.o utils.o

%.o: %.c $(DEPS)
	$(CC) -c -o $@ $< $(CFLAGS)

main: $(OBJ)
	$(CC) -o $@ $^ $(CFLAGS)

.PHONY: clean

clean:
	rm -f *.o main
files.README.md:
# C Language Project Boilerplate

**This project was autogenerated using CodeJumpstart.**

This boilerplate sets up a basic C project with a simple Makefile.

## Project Structure
- `src/main.c`: The main C source file.
- `src/utils.c` and `src/utils.h`: Utility functions and header file.

## Getting Started
1. Run `make` to build the project.
2. Execute the `main` binary.
